file-mapping.src/index.html: contains HTML structure and links to CSS and JavaScript files
file-mapping.src/game.js: contains the JavaScript implementation for the game logic, including spaceship and asteroid behavior
file-mapping.tests/game.test.js: contains the unit tests for the game functionality and logic
file-mapping.docs/README.md: contains project documentation including how to run the game and features
file-mapping.scripts/build_and_run.sh: contains a bash script to install dependencies and run the project
